import "./App.css"; import "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css"; import { CardGroup, Navbar } from "react-bootstrap"; import { Nav } from "react-bootstrap"; import { NavDropdown } from "react-bootstrap"; import { Form } from "react-bootstrap"; import { FormControl } from "react-bootstrap"; import { Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import { Card } from "react-bootstrap"; import { CardImg } from "react-bootstrap"; import Image from "react-bootstrap/Image"; import Container from "react-bootstrap/Container"; import Row from "react-bootstrap/Row"; import Col from "react-bootstrap/Col"; import Carousel from "react-bootstrap/Carousel"; import AOS from 'aos'; import 'aos/dist/aos.css'; import $ from 'jquery'; function App() { AOS.init({ duration: "900" }); $(window).on('beforeunload', function() { $('body').hide(); $(window).scrollTop(0); }); function changeBackground(e) { e.target.style.color = 'red'; } return (

Welcome to my portfolio

About me

Professional background Hello I'm ShahRukh Ahmed, and I am a IT support specialist and web developer. I also design UI's in the meantime, but keep looking to find out more about me! Ethnic background I come from an Indian and African American background, and my father is from Hyderabad while my mother is from America. Location I am located in Normal, IL, and I have been in this twin city for most of my life.

Web development projects

Real-time cryptocurrency website A real-time website in which you can see various cryptocurrency prices.
